mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (name, category_id, price, quantity, description, delete_yn, creator_id, modifier_id, created_at, modified_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{categoryId}, #{price}, #{quantity}, #{description}, #{deleteYn}, #{creatorId}, #{modifierId}, NOW(), NOW())

INSERT INTO product_history (product_id, name, category_id, price, quantity, description, delete_yn, creator_id, created_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{categoryId}, #{price}, #{quantity}, #{description}, #{deleteYn}, #{creatorId}, NOW())
